channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: South Africa hosts G20 as tensions with U.S. flare amid boycott
item.description: The U.S. boycotts South Africa's G20 summit, sparking a diplomatic spat and throwing the global gathering into turmoil.

item.title: Can vaping help wean people off cigarettes? Anti-smoking advocates are sharply split

item.title: The female crash test dummy has been a long time coming — but she isn't here yet

item.title: Officer acquitted in death of Ta’Kiya Young, a pregnant Black mother accused of shoplifting
item.description: An Ohio officer has been acquitted of all charges after fatally shooting Ta’Kiya Young in a supermarket parking lot.

item.title: X begins rolling out the ‘About this account’ feature to users’ profiles
item.description: The feature will show where users are based, how they're connected to X, and how many times they've changed their username.

item.title: The hottest AI wearables and gadgets you can buy right now
item.description: We compiled all the hottest AI wearables currently available, including Bee, Friend, Plaud, and more.
